events.title: Breakfast Bash 2020
events.description: Originally planned as our spring fundraiser featuring a breakfast buffet including pancakes, eggs, bacon, pastries from Panera, fruit, coffee, and more. The event was cancelled due to the evolving situation involving COVID-19, prioritizing the health and safety of attendees, members, and families.

options.name: Event Ticket & Shirt
options.description: Includes guaranteed event shirt and meal

cancellationNotice.refundInfo: Full refunds issued for all tickets
cancellationNotice.alternativeSupport: General donations still accepted through separate form

events.title: Limb Loss Awareness Month Campaign
events.description: Join Aggies for Limbs in educating others and spreading awareness about limb loss and limb difference. A week-long social media campaign featuring daily challenges, educational facts about limb loss, and inspiring Angel spotlights. This virtual campaign allowed us to continue our mission of awareness and education during the COVID-19 pandemic.

engagement.format: Daily posts with challenges and facts

events.title: AFL Virtual Walkathon 2020
events.description: In the Fall of 2020, Aggies for Limbs adapted to the COVID-19 pandemic by organizing a virtual walkathon. Members could walk or run a distance of their choice at a location of their choice, allowing for safe participation while maintaining social distancing. This innovative approach enabled us to continue our mission of fundraising for prosthetics while ensuring everyone's safety.
features: Run or walk at your preferred location

outcome.achievement: Successfully adapted to pandemic conditions while maintaining our fundraising mission

gallery.alt: Two AFL members taking a selfie outdoors during their virtual walkathon, one wearing a maroon Texas A&M cap and hydration pack, the other in a white Nike cap
AFL member's selfie wearing organization t-shirt and giving thumbs up, with campus building visible in background
AFL member with maroon neck gaiter giving thumbs up during their walkathon segment on a residential street
Two AFL members in athletic wear posing under covered walkway during evening walkathon participation
AFL member showing organization t-shirt during nighttime walkathon segment with campus architecture in background

events.title: Kyle Field Concession Stand Volunteering
events.description: During the Fall 2020 semester, AFL members demonstrated their commitment to service by volunteering at Kyle Field's concession stands. Despite the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic, our members safely participated in this volunteer opportunity while following all health protocols, including wearing masks and maintaining social distancing. This event showcased our organization's adaptability and dedication to continuing our service mission even during unprecedented times.

gallery.alt: AFL members in grey organization t-shirts and face masks giving thumbs up while volunteering at Kyle Field concession stands during Fall 2020
